ValidationRule.description: If it is new Oppty for Core business, and Primary Quote Date is different from Oppty Close date, prompt user to update quote date before Close Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Business_Group__c ,'Core') , RecordType.DeveloperName = 'New_Business' , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , 'De-book Re-book')) , ( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__StartDate__c <> CloseDate ), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') ), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote Start Date is different from Oppty Close Date. Goto Quote Line Editor, update Start date and save the quote.
